com.bws.jdistil.core.validation.rules
Interface IActionRule

All Known Implementing Classes:
AtLeastOneFieldRule
public interface IActionRule

Interface specifying methods to implement when defining classes capable of performing action data validation.

Author:
Bryan Snipes

isValid

boolean isValid(java.lang.String actionId,
                java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String[]> data,
                java.util.Locale locale,
                java.util.List<java.lang.String> messages)
Validates action data and adds a formatted error message to a given list of messages.

Parameters:
actionId - - Action ID.
data - - Map of action data.
locale - - Locale.
messages - - List of error messages.
Returns:
boolean - Valid action data indicator.
